name: The Maze Escape
description:
This is 3D Shooter Project although there were some problems with my shooter prefab as it wasn't compatible with my operating system. despite that, I have tried my best to make a 3D game. I really hope you take that into consideration while giving a grade. 

I have changed the terrain textures 

added a new level with different challenges 

added different music with the game 

completed about page and main page
